info.title: FlightInfo
info.description: Arriving and departing flights to and from Swedavia airports.

get.description:
## Query flight information using an OData filter expression **Supported fields:**
airport: IATA code for any Swedavia airport
flightType: A for arrival and D for Departure
scheduled: Local swedish date for departure or arrival
estimated: Utc date and time for estimated departure or arrival
flightStatus: See documentation or response for status codes
flightId: Operator code and flight number

**Supported operations:** and, or, eq, ne, gt, ge, lt, le

**continuationtoken**
Used for getting next set of flights. Use the value from your last result to get updated flights.
If no flights have been updated, you will get a result without flights.
You can store your contiunationtoken locally and reuse it in a later call.
The token is base64 encoded and needs to be escaped client side.
In .NET a client would call "token = Uri.EscapeDataString(token);

**Examples:**
Get departures from Arlanda for 2019-09-21:
airport eq 'ARN' and scheduled eq '190921' and flightType eq 'D'

Get arrivals from Arlanda and Visby for 2019-09-21:
(airport eq 'ARN' or airport eq 'VBY') and flightType eq 'A' and scheduled eq '190921'

Get single flight:
airport eq 'ARN' and scheduled eq '190921' and flightType eq 'D' and flightId eq 'SK007'

Query for estimated times:
airport eq 'ARN' and estimated eq '2019-07-02T08:30:00' and flightType eq 'D'

Get departures from Arlanda for specific airline:
airport eq 'ARN' and type eq 'D' and airline eq 'SK'

To get all flights, leave the filter paramter empty

**Call Limit**
This endpoint is limited to one call per two seconds. Any additional calls will result in a HTTP status code 429, Too Many Requests.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: OData filter expression. Omit to get all flights.

parameters.name: continuationtoken
parameters.description:
The token is base64 encoded and may need to be escaped.
In .NET a client would call:
Uri.EscapeDataString(token)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Format - int32. Number of items to return. Default 25. Max allowed 1000.

flights.description: A list with one or more flights

viaDestinations.description: A list of airports a flight will land on the way to the (final) destination airport

remarksEnglish.description: Remarks intended for FIDS screens in English

remarksSwedish.description: Remarks intended for FIDS screens in Swedish

diIndicator.description: Indicator showing if the flight is domestic (D), international (I) or Schengen (S).

iata.description: The iata code of the party operating the flight

icao.description: The iata code of the party operating the flight

scheduledUtc.description: Scheduled time of departure in UTC

estimatedUtc.description: Estimated time of departure in UTC

actualUtc.description: Actual time of departure in UTC

gate.description: Uniquely defines one gate at the airport.

gateAction.description: The stage in the boarding. Open O or Closed C.

gateOpenUtc.description: The UTC time at which the gate is opened for passenger processing

gateCloseUtc.description: The UTC time at which the gate is closed for passenger processing.

checkInStatus.description: The check in status. Open O or Closed C

checkInDeskFrom.description: The first check in desk code

checkInDeskTo.description: The last check in desk code

callsign.description: Uniquely identifies an aircraft using the airspace around an airport

flights.description: A list with zero or more flights

remarksEnglish.description: Remarks intended for FIDS screens in English

remarksSwedish.description: Remarks intended for FIDS screens in Swedish

viaDestinations.description: A list of airports a flight will land on the way to the (final) destination airport

diIndicator.description: Indicator showing if the flight is domestic (D), international (I) or Schengen (S).

scheduledUtc.description: Scheduled time of arrival in UTC

estimatedUtc.description: Estimated time of arrival in UTC

actualUtc.description: Actual time of arrival in UTC

gate.description: Uniquely defines one gate at the airport.

firstBagUtc.description: UTC time for first bag on baggage belt

lastBagUtc.description: UTC time for last bag on baggage belt
